channel.title: Comments on: Kelly’s One Year Off… and counting
channel.description: A Year Off With Our Kids

item.title: By: Carol grant stevens
item.dc:creator: Carol grant stevens
item.description: Kelly, it has been a joy following your life experiences, as Pink Days. On the road we have meet so many people young and old who have taken time off to smell the roses and live each day to the fullest! We are travelers not tourists. May each day bring you more joy than the next.
item.content:encoded:
Kelly, it has been a joy following your life experiences, as Pink Days. On the road we have meet so many people young and old who have taken time off to smell the roses and live each day to the fullest! We are travelers not tourists. May each day bring you more joy than the next.

LikeLiked by 1 person

item.title: By: Amy
item.dc:creator: Amy
item.description: I am proud of you guys for taking charge and living! Life is a roller coaster and you two have had an amazing year along the ride! Hope to see you in Vail in a few weeks..
item.content:encoded:
I am proud of you guys for taking charge and living! Life is a roller coaster and you two have had an amazing year along the ride! Hope to see you in Vail in a few weeks..

LikeLiked by 1 person
